summary: Branding and hours content were centralized via `cafe37Content` and a new `businessHours` utility, and HTML metadata was updated. However, the diff summary also indicates many unrelated UI/admin/catalog changes that exceed the stated non-goals, and the Contact page’s full weekly hours display cannot be confirmed from the truncated snippet.

missing_requirements.requirement: Contact page “Hours” section displays the full weekly schedule with the exact times provided for each day.
missing_requirements.reason: `ContactPage.tsx` is truncated before any explicit “Hours” section rendering is shown. While `getFormattedSchedule()` is imported and called, the diff summary does not provide evidence that the weekly schedule is actually rendered on the page with the required formatting.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad changes to menu/catalog/admin functionality and styling (e.g., CRUD pages, seeding hooks, ₹ pricing, checkout/cart/product detail redesign) beyond updating branding text and business hours.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists as non-goals: “No changes to menu/catalog/admin functionality beyond updating displayed branding text and hours content.” The diff summary indicates many such changes in `frontend-file-summaries.txt`.

hallucinated_features.description: Addition of new About/Contact routes and related page content (beyond hours/branding).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; the request is limited to branding text, business hours display, and HTML metadata updates.
